title: Looks familiar and free
content:
I swear I've seen this. For some reason I thought it was a font that came with Adobe Type manager, but apparently not...

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014123708im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bit_like_nueva_6564.jpg)
author: Richard Hunt

comments.content: Thanks. Don't like it but that's what the client wants...
Want something a little nicer, but close to the same feel, try Aldus or Palatino.
